column4: I cannot boot from the LiveCD 8.10.  I have Nvidia Nforce 630i chipset.  WDC 500GB SATA HDD. No externals plugged in besides monitor,keyboard,mouse,ethernet.  System Hangs at ata6: PATA max UDMA/133 cmd 0x170 ctl 0x376 bmdma 0xffa8 irq 15
do you have SATA or IDE drives?
so the error seems to be regarding you DVD or CDROM drive then the PATA suggests it's an IDE error???
what sort of system are you using here?
